ISSUE.TITLE: Wrong variable name in ProductAttributeController:
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: line 254, in UsedByProducts method: (Nop.Web/Administration/Controllers/ProductAttributeController.cs ) ` var **orders** = _productService.GetProductsByProductAtributeId ` we want to display products with specified product attribute, so the variable name should be products, not orders.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #271 Further changes (setting interaction type for the entire groups of requirements)
